data: Ortl’er | Mont Blanc | Tyrol | Nauders | Swiss Alps

The Ortl’er is the Mont Blanc of the Tyrol, and seen from Nauders, a village on a green, grassy table land, more than four thousand feet above the sea, can well bear comparison with the boldest of the Swiss Alps.
Diary And Notes Of Horace Templeton, Esq. Volume II
